predictions.text: Bitcoin (BTC-USD) will close at or above $130,000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified via CoinDesk Bitcoin Price Index (BPI) or Yahoo Finance (BTC-USD) daily close (UTC). Any single UTC day with a close >= 130,000 satisfies.
monitoring_signals: DXY dollar index level and trajectory
predictions.rationale: Momentum, macro hedge demand, and supportive liquidity favor a new marginal high above 130k within October.

predictions.text: COMEX Gold (GC) front-month futures will settle at or above $2,800 per troy ounce on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: CME Group official settlement price for the most-active COMEX Gold futures contract. Any daily settlement >= 2,800 qualifies.
monitoring_signals: CFTC COT managed money net length
predictions.rationale: Carry-like macro hedges and softer real yields provide a path to incremental highs in gold.

predictions.text: ICE Brent crude oil front-month futures will settle at or above $94.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: ICE Futures Europe official settlement for front-month Brent (CO). Any daily settlement >= 94.00 satisfies.
monitoring_signals: EIA weekly crude/product inventories and refined product demand
predictions.rationale: Tight physical balances, seasonal runs, and geopolitical risk can lift Brent to mid-90s near term.

predictions.text: USD/JPY (Yahoo Finance: JPY=X) will trade at or above 165.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Yahoo Finance intraday high (UTC) for JPY=X. Any UTC-day high >= 165.00 qualifies.
monitoring_signals: US-Japan rate differentials (UST vs JGB yields)
BoJ policy guidance and interventions rhetoric
US CPI/PCE prints and Fed path
Nikkei risk sentiment and equities flows
predictions.rationale: Pro-stimulus LDP leadership and wide rate differentials support incremental yen weakness to 165.

predictions.text: NFIB Small Business Optimism Index for September 2025 will print between 89.0 and 92.0 in the release due 2025-10-08.
predictions.verification_criteria: NFIB press release and historical data page. The September 2025 headline index must be >= 89.0 and <= 92.0.
monitoring_signals: Rates and credit conditions for SMEs
predictions.rationale: Tight credit and cooling demand likely keep small business sentiment subdued within a narrow range.

predictions.text: University of Michigan 5–10 year inflation expectations (final) for October 2025 will print between 2.8% and 3.0% in the release due 2025-10-25.
predictions.verification_criteria: University of Michigan Surveys of Consumers final October 2025 report. The 5–10 year median inflation expectations must be >= 2.8% and <= 3.0%.
predictions.rationale: Long-run expectations have been anchored; modest energy moves should keep them near 3%.

predictions.text: China CPI (headline, YoY) for September 2025 will print between 0.4% and 0.9% in the NBS release by 2025-10-14.
predictions.verification_criteria: National Bureau of Statistics of China official CPI release for September 2025. The headline YoY figure must be within [0.4%, 0.9%].
monitoring_signals: China pork prices and food CPI inputs
predictions.rationale: Weak domestic demand with modest food price recovery supports low but positive headline inflation.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10Y–2Y Treasury yield spread (FRED: DGS10 minus DGS2) will close at or above 0.00 percentage points on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED daily series: DGS10 and DGS2. A daily close where DGS10 - DGS2 >= 0.00 confirms.
predictions.rationale: Re-steepening risk rises with term premium rebuilding and late-cycle dynamics; a brief de-inversion is plausible.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-06 close to 2025-11-30 close, Nikkei 225 (^N225) will outperform KOSPI (^KS11) by at least 3.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare percentage change in adjusted close from 2025-10-06 to 2025-11-30 for ^N225 and ^KS11 on Yahoo Finance. Outperformance >= 3.0 pp qualifies.
monitoring_signals: USD/JPY levels and BoJ policy stance
Semiconductor cycle (SOX index) and Korea export data
predictions.rationale: Pro-stimulus policy and weak yen aid Japan equities; Korea remains more China/semis sensitive.

predictions.text: U.S. field production of crude oil (monthly, EIA Petroleum Supply Monthly) for September 2025 will be at or above 13.5 million barrels per day in the report published by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: EIA Petroleum Supply Monthly Table 1.1. The September 2025 U.S. crude oil field production must be >= 13.5 mb/d.
predictions.rationale: Productivity gains and Permian growth keep U.S. crude output pressing record highs into early autumn.

predictions.text: The U.S. AAA national average price for regular gasoline will print at or below $3.30 per gallon on at least one day by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: AAA Gas Prices national average for regular gasoline. Any daily reading <= $3.30 by the deadline qualifies.
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand fade and improving supply should ease pump prices into mid-November.

predictions.text: The ICE BofA MOVE Index (FRED: MOVE) will close at or below 90.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED series MOVE daily close. Any day with MOVE <= 90.0 by the deadline satisfies.
monitoring_signals: Treasury auction outcomes and refunding plans
Fed communication and policy path clarity
Term premium proxies and cross-asset volatility (VIX)
predictions.rationale: Event risk passes and clearer Fed guidance can compress rates volatility intermittently into late fall.
